it.polimi.se2018.model

Class TestDie

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.DieTest

  • public class TestDie
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to test the methods of the class Die.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestDie() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testDecrease()
      Tests the method decrease when it can be applied to a die.
      void testFailedConstructor()
      Tests that it's not allowed to create a die with invalid value (lower than the range).
      void testFailedConstructor2()
      Tests that it's not allowed to create a die with invalid value (higher than the range).
      void testFlip()
      Tests the method flip(): when a die d is flipped the new die must have a value equal to 7-d.getValue() and the colour mustn't change.
      void testHashCode()
      Tests the method hashCode().
      void testIncrease()
      Tests the method increase when it can be applied to a die.
      void testInvalidDecrease()
      Tests the behaviour of the method decrease() when it can't be applied to a die: an exception must be thrown.
      void testInvalidIncrease()
      Tests the behaviour of the method increase() when it can't be applied to a die: an exception must be thrown.
      void testRoll()
      Checks that when a die is rolled the colour remains the same.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • TestDie

        public TestDie()

    • Method Detail

      • testFailedConstructor

        public void testFailedConstructor()
        Tests that it's not allowed to create a die with invalid value (lower than the range).

      • testFailedConstructor2

        public void testFailedConstructor2()
        Tests that it's not allowed to create a die with invalid value (higher than the range).

      • testRoll

        public void testRoll()
        Checks that when a die is rolled the colour remains the same.

        Also tests the method getColour() and the constructor with two parameters.

      • testFlip

        public void testFlip()
        Tests the method flip(): when a die d is flipped the new die must have a value equal to 7-d.getValue() and the colour mustn't change.

        Also tests the method getValue.

      • testDecrease

        public void testDecrease()
        Tests the method decrease when it can be applied to a die.

      • testInvalidDecrease

        public void testInvalidDecrease()
        Tests the behaviour of the method decrease() when it can't be applied to a die: an exception must be thrown.

      • testIncrease

        public void testIncrease()
        Tests the method increase when it can be applied to a die.

      • testInvalidIncrease

        public void testInvalidIncrease()
        Tests the behaviour of the method increase() when it can't be applied to a die: an exception must be thrown.

      • testHashCode

        public void testHashCode()
        Tests the method hashCode().
